title: $(FrameworkSDKRoot) is empty in VS2022
body:
<!-- This is a template that helps us provide quicker feedback. Please use any relevant sections and delete anything you don't need. -->

### Issue Description
When editing C++ project properties, the macro $(FrameworkSDKRoot) is empty in VS2022, but is defined in VS2019.  This affects our MSBuild scripts.


I have attached image “frameworksdkroot.png” which shows the value being defined in VS2019 project properties but missing in VS2022 project properties.


Transferred from https://developercommunity.visualstudio.com/t/FrameworkSDKRoot-is-empty-in-VS2022/1587825
